communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the South Carolina Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Records for all Name Image and Likeness (NIL) Clubs for NCAA teams and/or athletes at The Citadel to include, without limitation, Club Charters, operating proceedures, members, faculty or other advisors, financial records and all regulations, policies, Memorandums and proceedures that govern their creation, operation, membership, disbursement of funds, and other matters for the period August 1, 2022 - the date of this request. Records should also include any and all exemptions from Citadel policies, regulations, memorandums or other governance.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 15 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Anonymous

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the South Carolina Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Records showing what specifically is included in the “Cadet Activity Fee” cadets are chared as part of their tuition under other fees as well as the financial records showing ledger itemized income and expenditures for Cadet Activity fees for the 2008 – 2009, 2009 – 2010, 2020 – 2021, 2021 – 2022, 2022 – 2023, 2023 – 2024 and 2024 – 2025 academic years including how this fee per cadet was determine, who approved the fee, all income to this fund by source, and all expenditures for these funds to the line-item level by student or other activity. For 2024 – 2025 include what is programmed, allocated and committed to date. Itemized expenditures are requested for the amount allocated and line-item expenditures to each club and student organization and what was budgeted for each for the selected academic years what will enable analysis of allocated to expended and within expenditures identify what products or services were procured. These should include the portion of these fees allocated for cadet activities consisting of facilities maintenance, debt service, cadet counseling services, cadet organizations and any other expenditures from this fund by office or organization that expended the funds, by supply or service purchased. Itemized expenditures by category and organization should total the amount reported as collected from Cadets and other identified sources. This information should be readily available in any reasonable standard accounting system using acceptable accounting practices and so should not require a significant level of efforts to identify and provide those records.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 15 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Anonymous

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the South Carolina Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Records showing what specifically is included in the “Uniform fees” that are part of the Sudent activities fees charged cadets at The Citadel as well as the financial records showing ledger level itemized income and expenditures for Uniforms fees for the 2020 – 2021, 2021 – 2022, 2022 – 2023, 2023 – 2024 and 2024 – 2025 academic years including how this fee per cadet was determine, who approved the fee, all income to this fund by source, and all expenditures for these funds to the line-item level. For 2024 – 2025 include what is programmed, allocated and committed to date. These should include the portion of these fees allocated for uniforms and related Activities to include, without limitation, a definition of each “ Activity”. Itemized expenditures for uniforms and related Activities should total the amount reported as collected from Cadets and other identified sources. Itemized expenditures are requested for the amount allocated and line-item expenditures to each areas and what was budgeted for each for the selected academic years what will enable analysis of allocated to expended and within expenditures identify what products or services were procured. This information should be readily available in any reasonable standard accounting system using acceptable accounting practices and so should not require a significant level of efforts to identify and provide those records.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 15 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Anonymous

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Voluntary Recognitions for Quarter 4, 2024
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Please provide records sufficient to determine the number of voluntary employee union recognitions from October 1, 2024 through December 31, 2024. If available, please provide records about individual recognition with such fields as employer, location, description of bargaining unit, union, and size of unit, and any other non-exempt fields on Form NLRB-5581.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Forest Gregg
